scripts.test:customer: cross-env TEST_USER=$npm_config_user TEST_PASSWORD=$npm_config_password cypress run --spec 'e2e/suites/customer_service_suite.js' --browser chrome --headed
scripts.test:cart: cross-env TEST_USER=$npm_config_user TEST_PASSWORD=$npm_config_password cypress run --spec 'e2e/suites/cart_flow_suite.js' --browser chrome --headed
scripts.test:parallel: cross-env TEST_USER=$npm_config_user TEST_PASSWORD=$npm_config_password run-p test:customer test:cart
